pageContent: Purpose: This study aimed to analyze technical and clinical factors related to oncological outcomes in patients with localized prostate cancer (PC) who were treated with whole-gland high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU).

metaData.source:
[Minimally invasive vs. open surgical procedures in the treatment of prostate cancer]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25608472/
